svg.title: SVG embedded by reference by dynamic--object-svg-unloaded.xhtml
svg.script: var embedding_element; function handle_load(e) { embedding_element = e.originalTarget.ownerDocument.defaultView.frameElement; top.document.addEventListener("MozReftestInvalidate", load_new_page, false); } function load_new_page() { // We could set embedding_element.data to load the new page, but that: // // a) Crashes if we don't use setTimeout // // b) Actually works, perhaps because it takes a different code path to the // path that's taken when a user clicks on a link in the embedded SVG // // For these reasons we set document.location.href on the SVG document. document.location.href = 'dynamic--object-svg-unloaded-b.xhtml'; }
